---
title: "Roles"
---

To fully utilise AT-MDP there are several key roles that need to be fullfilled.

|Role           |Resource  |Function
|:--------------|:---------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Data Engineer  |AxeTech   |Design and build a platform to ingest, process, and store data       |
|Data Analyst   |Customer  |Understand the underlying dataset and it's relevance to the business |
|Report Writer  |Customer  |Create dashboards and reports that provide business insights         |
